body:
Well, maybe there is a thread like this somewhere but I don't know, so let's share our internet speed results!

Instructions :
1.Go to http://www.speedtest.net/
2.Press begin test
3.After test,press "share this result"
4.Press image
5.Press copy
6.Press insert image in avicus forums, then paste the link 
7.Share your result!

I'll go first

Usually I get 40mbps but today something is wrong
